tns:patch.author: Diego
tns:patch.description: Filter applied on pledges report shows wrong information

script.lang: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_donor_type AS SELECT f.id, ot.org_type, ot.amp_org_type_id AS org_type_id FROM amp_funding_pledges f, amp_organisation o, amp_org_group gr, amp_org_type ot WHERE f.amp_org_id = o.amp_org_id AND o.org_grp_id = gr.amp_org_grp_id AND ot.amp_org_type_id = gr.org_type ORDER BY f.id, ot.org_type;
